name: Smartwool PhD Run Light Elite Low Cut Socks - Unisex
categories: PhD Run Light Elite Low Cut Socks
description: Indestructawool technology and targeted cushioning designed for runners. The high-density knit is super-durable and provides long lasting comfort.Made of merino wool, nylon and elastane with 4-degree fit for excellent recovery.Strategic mesh zones add moisture and temperature control.Light Elite cushioning for shock absorption in targeted zones.Seamless toe for comfort over varied terrain.Narrower profile is designed to fit a woman's foot.
